title: Cheesy garlic mashed potato
ingredients: ['1.4kg potatoes', '120ml hot milk', '120g plain cream cheese or cream cheese with herbs', '50g chopped spring onions, divided', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g grated Cheddar cheese']
